ValidationRule.description: Identifies situations where "5500 Situation" doesn't match data entered in Prior Year & Final 5500 Sections 1 of 2
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordTypeId = '01237000000N0lp' && ISPICKVAL(X5500_Situation__c, 'Prior Year Only') && ( NOT(ISBLANK( Plan_Year_End_Final__c )) || NOT(ISBLANK( Form_Year_Final__c )) || NOT(ISBLANK( ASC_URL_Link_Final__c )) || NOT(ISBLANK( Due_Date_Final__c )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Situation = Prior Year Only but data is entered in the "Final 5500 Section" - Either "Situation" or data in Final 5500 section needs to be corrected.
